name: wa}{else
description:
wa}{else experiment (based on Godot Voxel Tools build - https://github.com/Zylann/godot_voxel)

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - constructive shoot

Right Mouse Button - destructive shoot

Space - jump and fly

F - fullscreen on/off

PgDown - show shoot type dialog ("S" - each shoot is sphere with fixed radius, "R" - each shoot is smooth cube with random size)

P - change graphics modes

N - recreate world

Middle Mouse Button or Esc - show mouse cursor
